name: Sea Glass Necklace Sterling Silver Rectangle Locket
description:
Brand new design! I began with a genuine sea glass gems from Northern California in shades of all the RAREST colors! I wire-wrapped it in Sterling Silver and suspended it inside of this Sterling Silver rectangular cage. A new modern twist to sea glass! Hours of love went into creating this piece !! The pendant measures 1/3" by 1 1/2". An 18 inch Sterling Silver chain is included. !6 inch and 20 inch are also available upon request.

Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon -ready for gift-giving. Complimentary gift card is available upon request :)

name: Silver Sea Glass Jewelry Fish Necklace Rare Genuine Blue Sea Glass
description:
Striking and rare, genuine cobalt and cornflower blue sea glass with beautiful and bright white sea glass to add some pop ! All sea glass was collected in Puerto Rico recently. Pewter fish components are strung between the sea glass gems and cobalt blues glass beads complete the focal piece.

An all Sterling silver chain and stunning, artisan-made Sterling silver starfish clasp complete the piece which measures 18 inches in length.

name: Sea Urchin And Sea Glass Pendant Necklace in Sterling Silver
description: I love this coral color sea urchin ! It is handmade pottery made for my shop by a fellow artisan. I hand wire-wrapped it in all sterling Silver and dangled luscious, rare Californian sea glass in aqua, yellow and sea foam. The beads are all Sterling Silver as well ensuring many, many years of wear. The pendant measures 1" by 2" and comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain. I have 16" and 20" if you prefer. Just let me know. Comes with a complimentary gift box.

name: Pretty In Pink Cresting Wave Genuine Sea Glass Necklace
description: Ultra-rare pinks sea glass gem found in Northern California Recently. What a find ! It probably began as a piece of Depression Glass. Really, really special ! A beautiful piece of white sea glass adds to the pendant. The glass bead depicts a beautiful starry night with a wave cresting in the ocean.Gold star are sprinkled across the sky. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. It is magnificent!. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with an 18 inch .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: GENUINE Turquoise Sea Glass Earrings Sterling Silver Swarovski Pearls
description:
Striking Sterling Silver and genuine Swarovski crystal pearl earrings highlighted by genuine, flawless, and rare ocean-tumbled turquoise sea glass gems from Northern California. Wear your love for the ocean for all the world to see! I have clustered the Swarovski crystal beads together after hand wire-wrapping each one of them. All components are Sterling silver including the ear wires. Earrings measure 1/2" by 2". 

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! A complimentary gift card is available upon request.

name: GENUINE Very Rare Sterling Silver Heart Red English Sea Glass Necklace
description:
Genuine, beautiful and rare red English sea glass brought home from my recent trip to England! I found these lovely pieces myself.

These two lovely and perfect red English sea glass gem is so flawless and beautifully-rounded. English red sea glass is an exciting color to find. It is a really special necklace ! 

I encased these lovely and rare pieces of genuine sea glass in an all Sterling Silver locket lines with cubic zirconia. Quite striking ! 

This pendant measures 1/2" by 1. It comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain in the length of your choice.

Like all of my sea glass, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! Gift card available upon request.

name: Swarovski Crystal Pearl Necklace GENUINE Sea Glass Necklace In Pastels Very RARE Colors
description: Created with RARE colors of California Sea Glass collected by hand recently. This creation is just lovely. I have wire-wrapped a GENUINE Swarovski crystal pearl.Alongside the Hand wire-wrapped Swarovski crystal pearl, hangs an pastel stacker in sea foam green, turquoise, white, very rare yellow and amethyst colored sea glass. The sea glass was hand wire-wrapped in all Sterling Silver. All sea glass was found in Northern California. The stacker measures 3/8'' by 1" and comes with an 18"Sterling Silver chain.

name: GENUINE Sea Glass Necklace Spring Flower SRA Lampwork Bead
description: Sea glass as lovely as these pretty and rare gems in lime green, turquoise and white used in this pendant needs an equally lovely partner to accompany it. This handmade, glass lampwork bead really fits the bill! The glass is bead depicts a beautiful flower surrounded by bright aqua and lime green. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. These beautiful sea glass gems were found in Northern California. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and spacers. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Genuine Cobalt Blue Sea Glass Earrings In Sterling Silver
description: Beautiful, rare and perfect cobalt blue sea glass gems that I found in Puerto Rico recently. I paired the blue gems with bright white sea glass which really makes the cobalt pop ! The earrings are hand wire-wrapped in all Sterling silver and hang from pretty Sterling silver French hoops. Each earring measures 1 3/4" in length. Special pair ! Comes with a pretty box as seen in the pictures. Complimentary gift card and gift bag available upon request.

name: Santa Cruz Sea Glass Jellyfish Necklace
description:
Gorgeous and ultra-rare Santa Cruz sea glass - found on only one beach in the world ! Santa Cruz sea glass originated from the famous Lundberg Glass Studio in Davenport, California. These pieces are equally as historic as they are beautiful. The top piece is a bright red with a tinge of opaque white. And, the bottom and a gorgeous white opaque with green stripes. 

The tentacles of the jellyfish are made with .999 Hillstribe Silver - some of the highest-quality in the world. All elements are hand wire-wrapped in Sterling silver. The pendant measures 2 1/4" in length and comes with an 18 " Sterling Silver chain. If you need a different length, please let me know and I will accommodate you.

name: RARE Eco Friendly Sea Glass Jewelry Yellow English Sea Glass Sunflower Necklace
description:
Lovely rare, golden-yellow, English sea glass gem! This gorgeous sea glass gem was found in England recently. The sea glass gem hangs from a detailed all .925 sterling silver sunflower link and bail. The overall height of this pendant is 1/2 by 2''. This is an all sterling silver creation and comes with a solid 18 inch sterling silver chain. If you prefer 16 inch or 20 inch instead, just contact me and I will be happy to accommodate you.

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! Complementary gift card available upon request.

name: SRA Lampwork And Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Cobalt Blue And Lime Green
description: Ultra-rare lime green and cobalt blue sea glass gems found in Northern California recently. What a find ! Really special sea glass!  The SRA, handmade Lampwork glass bead depicts a beautiful lime, blue and orange garden-like scene. It really catches the eye ! I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with an 18 inch  .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Jellyfish Sea Glass Earrings
description: Unique jellyfish earrings created with the finest Hills Tribe .999 Sterling Silver tentacles and stunning and rare Californian sea glass! I collected these gems last year in Northern California. White, sea foam and turquoise complete the ensemble. The beautiful French ear hoops are all Sterling Silver. Each earring measures 2 1/2" in length. Truly one-of-a-kind for the ocean lover in you !

name: Ocean Memory Locket GENUINE Sea Glass Necklace RARE Eco Friendly
description:
Ocean memory locket necklace !

Keep the beach near your heart all day long!!

This pretty stainless steel locket is filled with beauty of the ocean including a starfish, shell and some of the rarest of sea glass tinies in sea foam, cobalt blue, aqua, turquoise and even red!. All the gems are are exquisite and were found in Northern California. Real sand completes the piece !

Please note the contents move around and are not glued in place - giving you an ever changing view! The locket opens and closes as well giving you the option of changing out the pieces when if you want to add your own special sea glass or shells.

The pendant measures 1 1/4" by 1 1/2 . A pretty 18 ".925 Sterling Silver chain in the length of your choice comes with the piece. I have 16", 20" and 24" chains available upon request. 

***Please remember, ALL of my sea glass is genuine, ocean-tumbled sea glass that I collect off the rocky and sandy shores myself. It is NEVER machine-tumbled. Please pay close attention to pictures and descriptions of sea glass and do not be afraid to ask questions about where the sea glass originates from.When it is too consistent in shape to other pieces, has too many rare colors in similar shapes, has a smoother rather than more pitted patina or its price does not reflect the value of the sea glass, it may be too good to be true. When in doubt, please ask. You are helping to preserve the integrity of the sea glass art by doing so and I along with my colleagues thank you for that :)

Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving. A complementary gift card is available upon request.

name: Genuine Santa Cruz Sea Glass Necklace Garden Pendant
description:
Gorgeous and extremely rare, Santa Cruz sea gem ! Found on only one beach in the world, this stunning gem is truly one-of-a-kind. There will never be another one like it. Santa Cruz sea glass originates from the famous Lundberg Glass Studios in California. After being tossed into a river along the studios at the end of a work day during the 1970's, this gem, made its way into the Pacific Ocean and washed ashore recently on a local beach. The history is as fascinating as the beauty of the gem !!

This piece is a clear to opaque white. It has a stunning and rare, green millefiori - reminiscent of Milano glass. This piece was intended to make a gorgeous vase or paperweight.

It reminds me of a flower in a garden so I paired it with a Sterling Silver flower bail. Eye-catching and a real treasure. It's a hard piece for me to part with.

Comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain. I have 16 and 20 inch chains as well if you prefer. A pretty, complimentary box comes with the necklace.

name: GENUINE English Sea Glass Multi Tree Of Life Necklace
description: Genuine English sea glass multi that I found during my recent trip to England! It is a beauty - perfectly-tumbled, lovely multi in shades emerald. It makes a lovely accent to this larger ALL Sterling Silver Tree-of-life pendant. The pendant which measures 1" by 1 1/3" and comes with a 18" Sterling Silver chain unless another length is requested at check out. I have 16" and 20" as well.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Aqua Sea Glass And Handmade Starry Night Lampwork Bead
description: Sea glass as lovely as the pretty aqua gem used in this pendant needs an equally lovely partner to accompany it. This handmade, glass SRA lampwork bead really fits the bill! The glass is bead depicts a beautiful starry night with a wave cresting in the ocean. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. It is magnificent! The beautiful sea glass gem was found in Puerto Rico. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Sterling Silver Filigree Locket Rainbow Necklace
description:
This pretty all Sterling Silver, rectangular locket is filled with the rarest of sea glass tinies in a rainbow of colors - orange, rare opaque yellow, red, teal, aquamarine, and green !  All the gems are are exquisite and were found my January 2103, Puerto Rico trip! This piece will be extremely hard to reproduce once this one is gone. I have very few precious pieces of these colors. The locket has the same design on the front and back. It measures 1/2" by 1 1/2".

A pretty .925 Sterling Silver 18 inch chain in comes with the piece. If you prefer 16 inch or 20 inch, please contact me and I will be happy to accommodate you.

name: Aqua Sterling Silver Genuine Sea Glass Bracelet With Crystals
description:
This beautiful 7 1/2" .925 Sterling Silver oval link bracelet is adorned with aqua sea glass gems in shades of aqua that I found in Northern California. Pretty and light-catching clear Swarovski crystals dangle alongside the sea glass.. The bracelet also had pretty, filigree-style square links spaced between for added interest. This is a perfect bracelet for a night on the town or sitting around a bonfire at the beach.

***Please remember, ALL of my sea glass is genuine, ocean-tumbled sea glass that I collect off the rocky and sandy shores myself. It is NEVER machine-tumbled. Please pay close attention to listings for sea glass and do not be afraid to ask the seller questions about where her/his sea glass originated from. It saddens me to say that some sellers will use machine-tumbled glass and list it as genuine sea glass. When it is too consistent in shape to other pieces, has too many rare colors in similar shapes, has a smoother rather than more pitted patina or its price does not reflect the value of the sea glass, it is probably too good to be true. When in doubt, please ask. You are helping to preserve the integrity of the sea glass art by doing so and I along with my colleagues thank you for that :)

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving!

name: Sterling Silver Genuine Cobalt Blue Sea Glass Earrings
description: Striking Sterling Silver "squiggle" wire earrings highlighted by genuine, flawless, ocean-tumbled cobalt blue sea glass gems from Northern California. Earrings measure 2 " in length. All components are Sterling Silver including the ear wires. Perfect earrings for the woman who loves her sea glass jewelry with a funky twist to it!

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Aqua With Pearl And Swarovski Aquamarine Crystal
description: This beautiful piece of aqua green sea glass that I found in Puerto Rico is perfect for the .925 Sterling Silver turtle that sits upon it. I hung a hand wire-wrapped freshwater pearl in Sterling silver along with a beautiful aquamarine Swarovski crystal alongside the sea glass. The piece really catches the light beautifully! The sea glass alone measures 3/4" by 1 " and comes with a 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Aqua English Sea Glass Necklace Channel Wrapped With Pearl
description:
Fresh from my recent trip to England!

This lovely and perfect aqua English sea glass gem is so flawless and rounded ! There are also gorgeous "c" marks on it indicating its old age and history. I channel-wrapped it in all Sterling Silver and dangled it from a Swarovski crystal pearl bead. Quite striking ! The sea glass is photographed on both sides and either is suitable for display. Would make a great addition to your wardrobe or a wonderful gift !

This pendant measures 1" by 1 1/2" by 1/2" and comes with an 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain. I do have other lengths (16" and 20") upon request.

Like all of my sea glass, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! I have gift cards available as well upon request.

name: Santa Cruz Sea Glass Rare Turquoise Starfish Necklace
description:
This striking, large and detailed Sterling Silver starfish charm dangles next to a rare Santa Cruz turquoise sea glass gem. Reminds me of the color of the water in the Caribbean. So striking and beautiful. Santa Cruz sea glass can only be found on one beach in the world! The large starfish charm measures a 1" by 1 1/4. Please note the smoothness and patina of the sea glass It was tossed around in the ocean for many decades before washing ashore. Such a vibrant feel to this piece! It is a wonderful dedication to the power of the ocean.

For those of you who know me well, you know I am a huge admirer and collector of Lundberg glass. If you are not yet knowledgeable about these magnificent works of art, allow me to give you a brief history. Back in the 1970's, the two Lundberg brothers started a glass making factory in Davenport, California. Their unique method of creating glass products helped make some of the most beautiful vases, paperweights and other glass objects the USA has ever created. In fact, Lundberg glass has been displayed in the Smithsonian Institute, the White House, the Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago among other institutions.

name: Orange Red Santa Cruz Sea Glass Ring
description:
Gorgeous Santa Cruz Lundberg sea glass ring ! All Sterling silver in a size 7. This perfect gem in a bright red/orange and opaque white is set in a four prong setting. Quite striking when worn.

Back in the 1970's, the two Lundberg brothers started a glass making factory in Davenport, California. Their unique method of creating glass products helped make some of the most beautiful vases, paperweights and other glass objects the USA has ever created. In fact, Lundberg glass is displayed in the Smithsonian Institute, the White House, the Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago among other institutions.

According to one worker I spoke to at the Lundberg Studios during a visit, decades ago, glass remnants of each day's production was dumped into the stream that ran past the studio which, in turn, made its way into the Pacific Ocean. It is called end-of-day glass - same way end-of-day glass was created in Northern England. Decades later, it is the source of the magnificent sea glass washing up on one particular beach in Santa Cruz, California.

name: Fine Jewelry Gold Dragonfly Necklace On GENUIINE Cobalt Blue Sea Glass 14 Karat Gold
description:
Created with the highest-quality materials available, this stunning, solid 14-Karat gold dragonfly charm on rare cobalt blue sea glass is truly one-of-a-kind!! This rare sea glass gem, measuring a larger 3/4 inch by 1 inch, was discovered on the beach in Puerto Rico. It is a gorgeous and sparkling hue! The dragonfly appears to be hovering over a pretty pond of blue.

The dragonfly charm is an American-made, all 14-Karat gold. It was made with high-quality craftsmanship and style. The dragonfly measures 1" by 3/4". 

The bail is all 14 Karat gold. And the gorgeous 20 inch Figaro chain is 14 Karat Gold as well.

***Please remember, ALL of my sea glass is genuine, ocean-tumbled sea glass that I collect off the rocky and sandy shores myself. It is NEVER machine-tumbled. Please pay close attention to pictures and descriptions of sea glass and do not be afraid to ask questions about where the sea glass originates from.When it is too consistent in shape to other pieces, has too many rare colors in similar shapes, has a smoother rather than more pitted patina or its price does not reflect the value of the sea glass, it may be too good to be true. When in doubt, please ask. You are helping to preserve the integrity of the sea glass art by doing so and I along with my colleagues thank you for that :)

name: Eco Friendly Earrings GENUINE Sea Glass Aqua Silver Handmade Chainmaille
description: These pretty aqua blue sea glass earrings are hand-created one link at a time by myself using all .925 Sterling Silver links. I hung two flawless pieces of aqua sea glass that I found in Northern California from the chainmaille. Sterling Silver earwires complete the earrings which measure 1/2" by 2". Elegant !

name: Santa Cruz Sea Glass Necklace Wire Wrapped Cobalt Blue And White
description:
Santa Cruz sea glass originated from the Lundberg Studios in California. Back in the 1970's, the two Lundberg brothers started a glass making factory in Davenport, California. Their unique method of creating glass products helped make some of the most beautiful vases, paperweights and other glass objects the USA has ever created. In fact, Lundberg glass is displayed in the Smithsonian Institute, the White House, the Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago among other institutions.

According to one worker I spoke to at the Lundberg Studios during a visit, decades ago, glass remnants of each day's production was dumped into the stream that ran past the studio which, in turn, made its way into the Pacific Ocean. It is called end-of-day glass - same way end-of-day glass was created in Northern England. Decades later, it is the source of the magnificent sea glass washing up on one particular beach in Santa Cruz, California.

Santa Cruz sea glass only washes ashore one one small beach in the world !

This Santa Cruz sea glass gem is a gorgeous, opaque white with a bold swatch of cobalt blue on its front . I hand wire-wrapped the gem with all Sterling Silver wire and spacers. A gorgepus, crystal Swarovski pearl completes the pendant. This piece is truly one-of-a-kind. I can promise you that there will never be an exact duplicate of this piece found! The entire pendant measures 3/4" 1 1/4". Perfect necklace for the sea glass lover looking for something completely unique!

An 18 inch .925 Sterling Silver chain comes with the pendant. If you prefer 18" or 20", just contact me. It also comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon.

If you have any questions, please contact me.

name: White and Aqua Sterling Silver GENUINE Sea Glass Earrings
description:
Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon -ready for gift-giving. Complimentary gift card available upon request.

Pretty pair of hand wire-wrapped, GENUINE white and aqua sea glass earrings. I found these pretty sea glass gems in Puerto Rico. All of the components used in these earrings are all Sterling Silver - wire, spacers and ear wire. Each earring measures 1/2" by 1 1/4".

name: GENUINE Sea Glass Earrings Sterling Silver Cobalt Aqua Green
description:
Gorgeous, long dangle earrings in all .925 Sterling Silver earrings. Such a unique design - sure to make a statement! Each earrings is highlighted by genuine sea glass from Northern California in rare cobalt blue, aqua and green. Pretty sterling silver French ear wires complete each earring which measures 3/4" by 3".

Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon -ready for gift-giving.

name: GENUINE Sea Glass Bracelet Sterling Silver Aqua And White Custom-made
description:
This is an all .925 Sterling Silver bracelet created with genuine aqua and white sea glass gems that I found in Northern California this year. Simply the finest ocean-tumbled sea glass baubles around set in the finest of metal with a gorgeous Sterling Silver clasp. There are 15 perfectly-tumbled round sea glass pieces used to create the bracelet. Sterling Silver round beads space the sea glass gems apart and add dimension and shine. 

* This bracelet will be custom-fit to meet your size requirement. Please let me know what size bracelet you wear and I will alter it for an exact fit at no additional expense.

name: Sterling Silver Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Aqua Turtle Locket
description:
Sweet all Sterling Silver sea turtle locket filled with perfect Puerto Rico light aqua sea glass! The locket measures 3/4" by 1 1/4" and hangs from an 18" Sterling Silver chain.

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving.

name: Handmade Lampwork Shell Bead With Genuine Sea Glass Necklace
description:
Wonderfully long and dangling pendant ! Truly an eye-catcher, this handmade, SRA lampwork shell pops with texture and color. The ribbed main shell as well as the raised sand dollar and other tiny shells at the bottom of the bead are so detailed. The design is the same on the front and back, making either side suitable for display. 

I strung three, genuine sea glass gems in turquoise, sea foam and white that I found in Northern California from the shell bead. Each piece hangs from Sterling silver chains in varying heights. I completed the pendant by hand wire-wrapping the entire piece in all Sterling Silver. The entire pendant measures 1 1/4" by 4".

This pendant comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain (16" and 20" are available upon request). Comes with a complimentary gift box.

name: GENUINE Santa Cruz Sea Glass Necklace Pink Stripe
description:
For those of you who know me well, you know I am a huge admirer and collector of Lundberg glass. If you are not yet knowledgeable about these magnificent works of art, allow me to give you a brief history. Back in the 1970's, the two Lundberg brothers started a glass making factory in Davenport, California. Their unique method of creating glass products helped make some of the most beautiful vases, paperweights and other glass objects the USA has ever created. In fact, Lundberg glass is displayed in the Smithsonian Institute, the White House, the Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago among other institutions.

According to one worker I spoke to at the Lundberg Studios during a visit, decades ago, glass remnants of each day's production was dumped into the stream that ran past the studio which, in turn, made its way into the Pacific Ocean. It is called end-of-day glass - same way end-of-day glass was created in Northern England. Decades later, it is the source of the magnificent sea glass washing up on one particular beach in Santa Cruz, California.

What a true gem! This Santa Cruz sea glass gem is gorgeous with layers of opaque white.It has a gorgeous pink stripe across its front. I paired it with a pretty Sterling Silver vine bail. This piece is truly one-of-a-kind. I can promise you that there will never be an exact duplicate of this piece found! The entire pendant measures 3/4" 1 1/8". Perfect necklace for the sea glass lover looking for something completely unique!

An 18 inch .925 Sterling Silver chain comes with the pendant. 

Like all my pieces, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - always complimentary.

name: Aqua Sea Glass Bracelet With Lampwork Bead And Crystal Pearls
description:
Beautiful aqua sea glass bracelet with a gorgeous, handmade globe lampwork focal bead ! So striking and festive! It screams summer to me.

I strung genuine Swarovski crystal pearl beads, four GENUINE aqua sea glass gems from Northern California, a stunning handmade focal globe bead in sea blues and greens pewter beads on stretch cord to create this bracelet. . It measures 7 1/2" in diameter but will stretch to fit most wrist sizes. However, if you prefer a larger or smaller length, just let me know and I will be happy to expand the bracelet for you. If you receive it and need an adjustment, I will be happy to do that for you free of charge.

name: Channel Wrapped Genuine Aqua Sea Glass Sterling Silver And Pearl
description:
Beautiful, channel-wrapped aqua sea glass pendant necklace! This gorgeous aqua sea glass gem comes from Northern California. I found it during a recent trip there. I wire-wrapped it in Sterling Silver wire and strung a genuine, Swarovski crystal white pearl above the sea glass. All components are Sterling Silver. This pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain. If you prefer 16" or 20'', please contact me. I will be happy to accommodate you.

All of the components I use are SOLID sterling silver - never plated or silver filled. The chains are all SOLID STERLING SILVER and are not plated or filled. Only the best top quality materials for an item I am sure you will treasure for years to come.

name: Sea Glass Necklace Pale Sea Foam Pewter Conch Shell with Pearl
description: This pretty shell charm is all pewter and so detailed. I hung a sweet piece of aqua sea glass from Puerto Rico with the shell as well as a freshwater pearl wire wrapped in all sterling silver. This is a large piece of sea glass measuring 3/4'' by 3/4'' They look ideal together. The shell charm measures 1/4" by 3/4". An 18" sterling silver chain comes with the pendant.

name: GENUINE Black Sea Glass Necklace RARE Wire Wrapped In Sterling Silver With Pearl
description:
This piece of flawless, surf-tumbled and substantial black glass was picked up off the sand of a beach in Puerto Rico by myself recently. The sea glass almost looked like a stone until I held it to the light and saw the faintest hint of light shining through a small edge of the glass. This piece is very old. Look carefully at the gorgeous patina of this sea glass. It is beautifully-pitted and polished. It probably started off its life as an old rum bottle back when it was believed that black glass preserved the alcohol longer than lighter shades of glass. This piece, in all probability, was tossed around in the ocean for 200 + years before washing ashore!. It is wire-wrapped with .925 Sterling Silver wire. A Swarovski crystal pearl completes the pendant. Either the front or the back is suitable for display as seen in the pictures. It measures 5/8" by 1 1/2". A pretty Sterling Silver chain in the length of your choice comes with the pendant. 

** True GENUINE black sea glass will have an aura of olive and brown (if very old) outline around the edges of it when held to the light. However, it will NOT appear olive or brown. It will look black. That is very important to keep in mind when investing in a black piece of sea glass. Olive and brown are very common colors and, therefore, least desirable to collectors and lower in value and price. If you would like to know more about the history of black sea glass, please contact me. I can talk history all day long;) I love it!!

name: Genuine Eco Friendly Aqua Sea Glass Cresting Wave Necklace
description:
Sea glass as lovely as these pretty bright aqua and white gems used in this pendant need an equally lovely partner to accompany it. This handmade, glass lampwork bead really fits the bill! The glass is bead depicts a beautiful cresting wave in the ocean. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. It is magnificent! The hue will vary between aqua and sea foam depending upon how the light hits it. 

The beautiful sea glass gem was found in Puerto Rico. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Sea Glass Necklace Aqua With Pearl And Sand Dollar Sterling Silver
description:
Pretty sea glass pendant created with genuine aqua sea glass from Puerto Rico! It is smooth and frosted in a pretty shape. I adorned the sea glass with a .925 Sterling Silver sand dollar charm. A genuine freshwater pearl, wire-wrapped in all .925 wire and spacers, completes the pendant which measures 3/4" by 1 3/4" Very sweet!

An 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain comes with the pendant.

name: Cresting Wave Lampwork Eco Friendly Aqua Sea Glass Necklace
description:
Sea glass as lovely as the pretty sea foam/aqua gem used in this pendant needs an equally lovely partner to accompany it. This handmade, glass lampwork bead really fits the bill! The glass is bead depicts a beautiful cresting wave in the ocean. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. 

The beautiful sea glass gem was found in Puerto Rico. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a pretty .925 Sterling Silver chain.

Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon as seen in the pictures - ready for gift-giving! A gift card is included upon request.

name: Genuine Santa Cruz Sea Glass Necklace Layers Of Luscious Green
description:
For those of you who know me well, you know I am a huge admirer and collector of Lundberg glass. If you are not yet knowledgeable about these magnificent works of art, allow me to give you a brief history. Back in the 1970's, the two Lundberg brothers started a glass making factory in Davenport, California. Their unique method of creating glass products helped make some of the most beautiful vases, paperweights and other glass objects the USA has ever created. In fact, Lundberg glass is displayed in the Smithsonian Institute, the White House, the Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago among other institutions.

According to one worker I spoke to at the Lundberg Studios during a visit, decades ago, glass remnants of each day's production was dumped into the stream that ran past the studio which, in turn, made its way into the Pacific Ocean. It is called end-of-day glass - same way end-of-day glass was created in Northern England. Decades later, it is the source of the magnificent sea glass washing up on one particular beach in Santa Cruz, California.

What a true gem! This Santa Cruz sea glass gem is a gorgeous, thick nugget with streaks of various shades of Spring green on all four sides . The top is a misty clear color that really makes its bottom half pop! I paired it with a pretty Sterling Silver vine bail. This piece is truly one-of-a-kind. I can promise you that there will never be an exact duplicate of this piece found! The entire pendant measures 1/2" 1 1/4". Perfect necklace for the sea glass lover looking for something completely unique! Comes with an 18 inch Sterling silver chain.

name: Genuine Aqua Sea Glass Ring In Sterling Silver
description:
Beautiful aqua sea glass gem that I found in Northern California ! It is set in a size 7 all Sterling Silver setting. Elegant and lovely.

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! Gift card available upon request.

name: Eco Friendly GENUINE Sea Glass Jellyfish Necklace Fine Silver
description:
Beautiful aqua and white sea glass make the body of this jellyfish. So cute!!! The jellyfish tentacles are created with very high-quality .999 fine silver - much higher quality than even Sterling Silver with a higher silver content and better tarnish-resistance. . Perfect for the beach or a night out on the town. The pendant is 3/8'' wide and 2 1/2'' in length. Comes with an 18" sterling silver chain.

Like all of my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving! Gift card available upon request.

name: Memory Locket Sea Glass Bracelet with GENUINE Rare Sea Glass Gems
description: Unique and striking memory locket bracelet filled with the rarest of sea glass gems found recently in Northern California ! The bracelet is all stainless steel - no more tarnishing. Also, great for people with allergies! The glass locket is lined with crystals for extra sparkle. The gems inside range in rare colors from yellow to aqua, turquoise, cobalt. lime and even pink! If you wanted to, the locket can be opened easily to put your own keepsakes in for the future.

name: Sterling Silver Spirals GENUINE Rare Turquoise Sea Glass Earrings Eco Friendly
description: Striking Sterling Silver spiral wire earrings highlighted by genuine, flawless, ocean-tumbled and very rare turquoise sea glass gems from Northern California. Earrings measure 1/2" by 1 1/2". All components are Sterling Silver including the ear wires. Perfect earrings for the woman who loves her sea glass jewelry with a funky twist to it!

name: Customized Personalized Initial Necklace With GENUINE Sea Glass
description:
This personalized initial necklace is a perfect gift for so many occasions - a graduation, Christmas, Weddings, birthdays...the possibilities are endless ! Comes with an 18" Sterling silver chain.

As always, my sea glass is genuine and picked up off the sandy shore myself. All components of the piece are Sterling Silver with the exception of the disk which is silver-plated. The pearl is a genuine, freshwater pearl.

The necklace comes with the pretty box shown in the picture. Complimentary gift card is available upon request.

name: Genuine English Sea Glass Necklace Rainbow And Mother Of Pearl
description:
I began this pendant with a rainbow of extremely rare sea glass gems from England - turquoise, aqua, cobalt, yellow and , rarest of all, orange! Like the other English sea glass, these pieces date back to Victorian times! I strung these gems from an all Sterling Silver and marcasite charm. Mother-of-pearl inlay completes the pendant. Just breathtaking when worn! The pendant measures 1" by 1 1/2".

This pendant measures 1/2" by 1" and comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Jewelry Elephant Pendant Locket Sea Foam Sea Glass
description:
Such a sweet elephant locket! Silver-plated, this locket holds pretty pieces of sea foam sea glass gem that I collected from Puerto Rico. The locket measures 3/4" by 1". The piece comes with a pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain. 

***Please remember, ALL of my sea glass is genuine, ocean-tumbled sea glass that I collect off the rocky and sandy shores myself. It is NEVER machine-tumbled. Please pay close attention to pictures and descriptions of sea glass and do not be afraid to ask questions about where the sea glass originates from.When it is too consistent in shape to other pieces, has too many rare colors in similar shapes, has a smoother rather than more pitted patina or its price does not reflect the value of the sea glass, it may be too good to be true. When in doubt, please ask. You are helping to preserve the integrity of the sea glass art by doing so and I along with my colleagues thank you for that :)

name: Eco Friendly Sea Foam Sea Glass Cresting Wave Necklace
description:
Sea glass as lovely as the pretty sea foam/aqua gem used in this pendant needs an equally lovely partner to accompany it. This handmade, glass lampwork bead really fits the bill! The glass is bead depicts a beautiful cresting wave in the ocean. It is hard to capture how detailed and beautiful this bead is without seeing it in person. It is magnificent! The hue will vary between aqua and sea foam depending upon how the light hits it. 

The beautiful sea glass gem was found in Puerto Rico. I wire-wrapped the sea glass and bead together in all .925 Sterling Silver wire and added a pretty Sterling Silver bail as well. The pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Modern Minimalist Jewelry Sea Glass Necklace Genuine Aqua Sea Glass
description:
Lovely modern, minimalist, contemporary sea glass necklace. This pretty light aqua with a tinge of sea foam piece of sea glass that I found in Northern California measures 3/8'' by 3/4'' dangles below this bright sterling silver textured link. The overall length of this necklace is 1 3/4''. This is an all sterling silver creation. An 18" Sterling silver chain is included. 

Like all my jewelry, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving!

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Sea Foam Sea Glass Heart Locket
description:
This sweet heart locket is silver-plated and filled with two perfectly-tumbled pieces of sea foam sea glass. I found both pieces of sea glass in Puerto Rico this past February. 

The front of the locket is a pretty filigree design while the back has an adorable heart pattern. A pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain comes with the piece.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Bracelet White And Aqua Sea Glass
description: Gorgeous silver-plated bangle bracelet - easily slips on and off most wrists. Beautiful and genuine sea glass in white and aquas accent the bangle. I found the sea glass in Northern California. Affordable and unique bracelet for ll the beach lovers out there! It's perfect for everyday as well as a special night out!

name: GENUINE Pink English Sea Glass Necklace
description:
Beautiful and rare, bright pink English sea glass multi found and brought home from my recent trip to England!

This lovely and perfect pink English sea glass gem is so flawless and beautifully-rounded ! There are also gorgeous "c" marks on its front indicating its old age and history. I channel-wrapped it in all Sterling Silver and dangled it from a crystal bead. A pretty Sterling silver bail completes the pendant Quite striking ! . 

This pendant measures 3/4" by 1 1/2" and comes with a Sterling Silver chain in the length of your choice.

Like all of my sea glass, this necklace comes beautifully-boxed with pretty ribbon - ready for gift-giving!

name: Trio Sea Glass Earrings Pastels Aqua White And Sea Foam Green
description: This is a pair of earrings in a style that is uniquely my own. They are all sterling silver. A trio of sterling silver wire is hand wrapped with lovely shades of genuine pastel sea glass courtesy of Mother Nature in aqua, sea foam green and white. Sea glass was found in Northern California by myself recently. They measure from the top of the ear wire to the bottom of the white sea glass 3 ''. Dangling nicely together they are 5/8'' wide.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Earrings Aqua And Sterling Silver
description: Simple and elegant sea glass earrings. Lovely shade of aqua. Perfect for the beach or an evening out at a classy restaurant or a bonfire at the beach. These earrings are sure to please as they will be a constant reminder of the beach. Sterling silver ear wire and jump rings. Earrings measure 3/8'' wide and are 1 1/4'' in length.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace Elephant Locket with Green Sea Glass
description:
Super cute locket necklace at SUPER BARGAIN price!!

Such a sweet elephant locket! Silver-plated, this locket holds a pretty Kelly green sea glass gem fresh off the shores of Puerto Rico. The locket measures 3/4" by 1". The piece comes with an 18 " Sterling Silver chain.

name: Genuine Sea Glass Necklace With Wire-Wrapped Pearl
description: This beautiful wire-wrapped freshwater pearl is so pretty! It really pops next to this perfect piece of genuine pale Aqua sea glass that I found in Puerto Rico. The pendant measures 5/8" by 1 1/4 ". A pretty 18" .925 Sterling Silver chain comes with the piece.

name: Flash Glass Genuine Sea Glass Necklace With Turquoise and Sterling Silver
description:
This gorgeous, unique and rare sea glass gem is a beautiful flash glass gem that came from Northern California . Flash glass is normally an art glass shard. If you look at it from the side, you can see tow layers of glass - the bottom is a clear glass and the top is a magnificent pattern of orange, red, yellow and blue swirls. I paired the sea glass with a Sterling Silver connector with a genuine turquoise gemstone in its center. A pretty Sterling silver bail completes the pendant which measures 1/2" by 1 1/2" and comes with an 18 inch Sterling Silver chain. 

***All items come gift-wrapped in the box and ribbon shown in the picture - ready for gift-giving!

name: Dragonfly Necklace GENUINE Sea Foam Sea Glass
description:
This pretty Sterling Silver Cloisonne dragonfly charm was created by skilled artisans. Each Cloisonne piece is hand-painted individually. The process takes hours!
Like all of my pieces, this beautiful piece of sea glass is perfectly-tumbled thanks to Mother Nature. I found it myself in Puerto Rico this July. None of my sea glass is ever altered by human hands. The color of the sea glass is sea foam with a touch of honeydew. It is quite lovely and accents the colors in the green and blue dragonfly perfectly. The pendant measures 1" by 1 1/2" comes with a pretty 18 inch .925 Sterling Silver chain.

name: Dangling Sterling Silver Wave Rare Cornflower Blue Sea Glass Earrings
description:
Eco-friendly and eye catching, these striking Sterling Silver ocean wave earrings highlighted by genuine, flawless, ocean-tumbled and very rare cornflower blue sea glass gems from Puerto Rico. In between the sea glass gems and the wave, I hand wire-wrapped gorgeous .999 Sterling silver Hill Tribe beads. They have a twisting design to them and really add dimension. Cornflower crystal beads complete the link. All components are made of the finest silver.

Beautifully long and dangling, the earrings measure 1" by 2 3/4". All components are Sterling Silver including the ear wires. Perfect earrings for the woman who loves her sea glass jewelry with a funky twist to it!

name: Aqua Sea Glass Pendant Necklace Leaf Design
description: This is such a sweet genuine, ocean-tumbled aqua sea glass gem.  This has a tinge of sea foam to it and is a nice sized, pendant piece measuring a full 5/8'' wide and 1'' in height. The total height from the top of the bail is 1 1/4''. I found it on a recent trip to Northern California - home of magnificent surf-tumbled sea glass. A gorgeous all pewter bail in a leaf design completes the pendant. An 18 inch Sterling silver chain is included. If you would like a 16" or 20" chain, please contact me and I will be happy to accommodate you.
